job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Description
Our client is seeking a Site Reliability Engineer to join one of the fastest-growing and most innovative startups in Atlanta. You’ll work collaboratively with software engineering to deploy and operate our systems, help automate and streamline our operations and processes, build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring and operations, and troubleshoot and resolve issues in our dev, test and production environments.This job can stuff your resume with the latest buzzwords like big data, machine learning, agile development and cookie pool, but that’s the least important thing about it. This job is hard and, though you may not know it yet, it’s your dream job.
Top Skills Required:
1+ years of AWS Administration (AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner preferred)
1+ years of coding and scripting (we use Ruby and most of its key frameworks)
1+ year of Linux Administration
Database experience (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis)
Experience with ticketing systems such as Jira or ZenDesk
Experience scaling a system (clustering, memory leak, bottleneck identification, etc.)
Strong interpersonal and collaboration skills
Ability to articulate, defend and evolve an idea
Nice to Have:
Build/deployment process management (we use GitHub)
Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, or other 3rd Party API experience
Experience with large-scale email deliverability, including SPF, DKIM, and DMARC
Open source contributions
Culture:
Casual, start-up environment that promotes personal and professional growth
Benefits:
Bonus potential
Medical/Dental/Vision plans
Paid parking/MARTA pass or ability to be 100% remote
Investors and co-founders with a proven track-record of success
Casual, start-up environment that promotes personal and professional growth
Location:
100% remote or ability to go into Atlanta office
